tha-ap251:0.3_0: Hearing this portion of the senior monks
tha-ap251:1.4_0: and what is the deathless state.
tha-ap251:2.3_0: I bowed down to the Buddha,
tha-ap251:4.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap251:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Bāhuka.
tha-ap251:6.1_0: The ninth part of the senior monks.
